## GoogleAITunedModelManager.createTunedModel() method

Create a new tuned model.

This operation is asynchronous and returns an operation that can be polled using getOperation().

Any fields set in the optional [SingleRequestOptions](./generative-ai.singlerequestoptions.md) parameter will take precedence over the [RequestOptions](./generative-ai.requestoptions.md) values provided at the time of the [GoogleAITunedModelManager](./generative-ai.googleaitunedmodelmanager.md) initialization.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createTunedModel(params: CreateTunedModelParams, requestOptions?: SingleRequestOptions): Promise<CreateTunedModelResponse>;
```
